name: Nightmare Diary
summary: Nightmare Diary is a Yume Nikki fangame. The main character is KNF, who has bloodstains all over him in the real world. In the dream world he is known as Ketsueki (血液, lit. Blood Liquid), and the bloodstains are removed. Your main goal is to explore the dream world and obtain effects. There is plenty of dialogue in the game as well.
